#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
int t,a;
 
cin>>t;
for(int j=0; j<t; j++){
unsigned long long area, number;
area = 0;
number=0;
cin>>a;
for(int i = 1; i<=a; i++){
area+= pow(i,2)*pow(a-i+1,2);
}
number = (a*(a+1)*(2*a+1))/6;
cout<<number%1000000<<" "<<area%1000000<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
